scripts.test: npx tsc --outDir dist --noEmit false && node --test tests
scripts.test:unit: npx tsc --outDir dist --noEmit false && node --test dist/__tests__/unit/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:integration: npx tsc --outDir dist --noEmit false && node --test dist/__tests__/integration/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:components: npx tsc --outDir dist --noEmit false && node --test dist/__tests__/components/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:all: npx tsc --outDir dist --noEmit false && node --test dist/__tests__/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:coverage: npx tsc --outDir dist --noEmit false && c8 --all --include='app/**/*.ts' --include='services/**/*.ts' --exclude='**/*.test.ts' --exclude='**/__tests__/**' --exclude='**/*.d.ts' node --test dist/__tests__/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:nyc: npx tsc --outDir dist --noEmit false && nyc --include='app/**/*.js' --include='services/**/*.js' --exclude='**/*.test.js' --exclude='**/__tests__/**' node --test dist/__tests__/**/*.test.js
